Text: If the capital-gains tax is too high, investors tend to hold on to assets to avoid being taxed. As a result, no revenue flows to the Treasury.
Cause: If the capital-gains tax is too high, investors tend to hold on to assets to avoid being taxed.
Effect: As a result, no revenue flows to the Treasury.
Sentence: <e1>If the capital-gains tax is too high, investors tend to hold on to assets to avoid being taxed.</e1> <e2>As a result, no revenue flows to the Treasury.</e2>
